dict.acceptation: 都市的；具有城市或城市生活特点的；市内；

sent.orig: Shanghai urban parks have experienced three periods: classical gardens、 neoteric urban parks and modern urban parks.
sent.trans: 上海的城市公园经历了传统的古典园林、民的近代公园和多元化的现代城市公园三个阶段。

sent.orig: Urban and rural development and urban-rural integration is an inevitable choice for urban and rural modernization.
sent.trans: 统筹城乡发展，实现城乡一体化是城乡现代化的必然选择。

sent.orig: Urban geological environment is considered as the basis of urban planning & urban ecological construction.
sent.trans: 城市地质环境是城市规划和城市生态建设的基础。

sent.orig: Urban landscape is an important vector of urban material civilization and inheritance of urban spiritual civilization.
sent.trans: 城市景观是城市物质文明的重要载体，更是城市精神文明的重要传承。

sent.orig: Urban passenger transport system is an important factor to affect urban transportation efficiency.
sent.trans: 城市客运交通体系是影响城市交通运输效率的一个至关重要的因素。
